courses.title: Machine Learning by Microsoft
courses.description: Learn foundational ML concepts including supervised, unsupervised, and reinforcement learning. This comprehensive course covers everything from basic algorithms to advanced neural networks, with hands-on projects and real-world applications.

syllabus.title: Introduction to Machine Learning
topics: Types of ML: Supervised, Unsupervised, Reinforcement

syllabus.title: Data Preprocessing
topics: Data cleaning and handling missing values

What you'll learn: Master fundamental ML algorithms and techniques
Build and deploy ML models using Python
Understand data preprocessing and feature engineering
Work with real-world datasets and projects
Learn model evaluation and optimization strategies
Prerequisites: Familiarity with data structures and algorithms
Course outcomes: Ability to build end-to-end ML solutions
Portfolio of ML projects for job applications
Access to Microsoft's ML tools and resources

courses.title: Data Analytics by Google
courses.description: Master data cleaning, analysis, and visualization using Google's industry-standard tools. Learn to transform raw data into actionable insights with Google Analytics, BigQuery, and Data Studio.

syllabus.title: Introduction to Data Analytics
topics: Types of data and data sources

Course outcomes: Skills to work as a data analyst

courses.title: Full Stack Development by IIT Kharagpur
courses.description: End-to-end web development training including frontend and backend technologies. Master both client-side and server-side development with modern frameworks and tools.

What you'll learn: Build complete web applications from scratch
Develop robust backend APIs with Node.js
Course outcomes: Skills to work as a full-stack developer

quizzes.title: Introduction to Machine Learning
quizzes.description: Test your understanding of basic ML concepts and algorithms

questions.question: What is Machine Learning?
options: A subset of artificial intelligence that enables computers to learn without being explicitly programmed

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT a type of Machine Learning?
What is the primary goal of supervised learning?
options: To find patterns in data without labels
To learn from labeled training data to make predictions
To optimize actions based on rewards

questions.question: Which algorithm is commonly used for classification problems?
What is overfitting in Machine Learning?
options: When a model performs well on training data but poorly on new data
When a model is too simple
When there's not enough training data
When the model is too fast

quizzes.title: Data Analytics Fundamentals
quizzes.description: Test your knowledge of data analytics concepts and tools

questions.question: What is the first step in the data analytics process?
Which tool is commonly used for data visualization?
What is descriptive analytics?
options: Understanding what happened in the past

questions.question: Which type of data is categorical?
What is a data dashboard?
options: A collection of charts and graphs

quizzes.title: Software Development Lifecycle
quizzes.description: Test your understanding of SDLC and development methodologies

questions.question: What does SDLC stand for?
Which phase comes first in SDLC?
What is Agile methodology?
What is a sprint in Agile?
Which is NOT a common SDLC model?

quizzes.title: Final Assessment: Data Analytics by Google
quizzes.description: Proctored final exam covering all key concepts in data analytics, Google Analytics, BigQuery, and Data Studio.

questions.question: Which Google tool is best suited for creating interactive dashboards?
What is the primary use of Google BigQuery?
Which of the following is NOT a valid data cleaning technique?
In Google Analytics, what does a 'session' represent?
options: A group of user interactions within a given time frame

questions.question: Which SQL clause is used to group rows that have the same values in specified columns?
